title.rendered: STEDI TOYOTA FORTUNER CRUSADE (LED MODELS) PIGGY BACK ADAPTER

content.rendered:
Toyota Fortuner Driving Light Piggy Back High Beam Adapter

DETAILS

Specifically designed to suit the Toyota Fortuner Crusade with factory LED Headlight ONLY.

The easy solution for wiring up your Driving Lights with no need for splicing, trapping or soldering as it is a direct Plug & Play install.

Designed to work with all STEDI Quick Fit Wiring Harnesses.

 

SPECIFICATIONS

CONNECTOR TYPE 6 Pin
FITS TOYOTA FORTUNER CRUSADE With Factory LED Headlights

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x Toyota Fortuner High beam Adapter

excerpt.rendered:
TOYOTA FORTUNER CRUSADE (LED MODELS / PRE AUG-2020) PIGGY BACK ADAPTOR

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
